You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesD D] > &dscy;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&DScy;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/0405/index.htm U+00405].
  * `&dscy;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/0455/index.htm U+00455].
